text.div:
Condition Category Code Value Set

Additional code for Assessed Need for Condition Category element

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/condition-category
  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/eLTSS/CodeSystem/eltss-condition-category-code
    CodeDisplay
    assessed-needAssessed NeedThe clinical and/or community-based necessity or desire as identified through an assessment that should be addressed by a service.

name: ELTSS_Condition_Category_code
title: Condition Category Code Value Set
description: Additional code for Assessed Need for Condition Category element
